name: Idiot Creature Wars
description:
Introducing Idiot Creature Wars the Game. Idiot Creature Wars is an RPG based game where you have to defeat Bad users and restore peace to the world. This game will have 3 big chapters inside the game + 1 Secret Chapter with some funny surprises along the way. Made in RPG Maker MV.

The Story: You were hired at the Idiot creature mall where bad users hang out. This would be your chance to end idiot creatures once and for all. You have to sneak explosives to the idiot creature mall and set them off. Even when the mall is destroyed, you have to defeat the leader of the idiots named Meowbahh in the Idiot creature factory.

This game is made in RPG Maker MV. This is my first game that I have made in RPG Maker so this game is pretty short as you can complete the game within 20-30 minutes minimum but you will get funny surprises and secrets for more content in the game.

Different versions of Idiot Creature Wars will also be posted here like the FNaF 57 Maker Edition.
